definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Theory of water-blend heavy oil and combustion mechanism were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 對重油摻水乳化的實質及乳化油燃燒過程進行了探討。

sentences.english: Theory of water-blend heavy oil and combustion mechanism were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 對重油摻水乳化的實質及乳化油燃燒過程進行了探討。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the technique of phacoemulsification with hard nucleolus cataract.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討硬核白內障超聲乳化的手術技巧。

sentences.english: The title alkyd resin modified waterborne nitrocellulose emulsion was prepared by alkyd resin phase inversion process.
sentences.chinese: 採用醇酸樹脂相反轉乳化法制備了硝化纖維素乳液。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a long-acting emulsion-type antirust fluid used for metal rust prevention.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及用於金屬防鏽的長效乳化型防鏽液。

sentences.english: The paper introduced the use of linseed gum for improving the sausage quality.
sentences.chinese: 研究了亞麻籽膠的乳化特性和對蛋糕品質的影響。

sentences.english: The tests showed emulsifier effect markedly on comprehensive performance of core-shell emulsion and coating film.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明，乳化劑對乳液及塗料綜合性能影響顯著。

sentences.english: This paper introduced emulsifying stabilization in the processing technology of pumpkin seed powder.
sentences.chinese: 對南瓜子粉加工工藝中的乳化穩定性進行了研究。

sentences.english: In addition , the choices of the emulsifiers system and the catalyst are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 該部分着重討論了複合乳化劑體系和催化劑的選擇。

sentences.english: The effect on surface hydrophobicity and emulsifying properties was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 測定了改性對大豆蛋白表面疏水性和乳化性的影響。

sentences.english: The big difference is that lacquers are designed as emulsifying products.
sentences.chinese: 最大區別是，清漆設計成是一種乳化的產品。

sentences.english: An invert-emulsion mud, or an emulsion whose continuous phase is oil.
sentences.chinese: 逆乳化泥漿，或者是油爲連續相的乳狀液。

sentences.english: Synthetic detergents replaced the soap with emulsifying agents, such as sodium lauryl sulphate.
sentences.chinese: 合成洗滌劑乳化劑如十二烷基硫酸鈉取代了皁粉。

sentences.english: Finally, the technique of micro emulsification was described in brief.
sentences.chinese: 最後簡要闡述了微乳化技術。

sentences.english: Novel milk sweet flavor was composited with enzymed fresh milk and flavoring substances.
sentences.chinese: 採用酶解新鮮牛奶及香原料創擬而得乳化奶糖香精。

sentences.english: Silicone oil emulsion had been successfully developed from high-viscosity silicone oil, and the main factors determining stability was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 高粘度硅油一直存在難乳化及乳液穩定性差的問題。

definition: to emit bubbles/to bubble/to foam (with rage)/to seethe
to remove makeup/(old) to take off formal dress and ornaments
